scripts.joinAPI: npx @redocly/cli join ogcapi-common-1.yaml ogcapi-features-1.yaml ogcapi-maps-1.yaml ogcapi-styles-1.yaml ogcapi-tiles-1.yaml ogcapi-processes-1.yaml
scripts.bundleAPI: npx @redocly/cli bundle ogcapi-common-1.yaml ogcapi-features-1.yaml ogcapi-maps-1.yaml ogcapi-styles-1.yaml ogcapi-tiles-1.yaml ogcapi-processes-1.yaml -o ./bundled
